text: A naxɛ, ‹Kafi n nan n ma ɲama ramini Misira bɔxi ra, n mu nu taa sugandixi Isirayila bɔnsɔɛe tagi n banxi tima dɛnnaxɛ. N man mu xɛmɛ sugandixi naxan findima n ma Isirayila ɲama yarerati ra. Kɔnɔ n bara Darisalamu nan sugandi alako n xili xa lu naa. N man bara Dawuda sugandi alako a xa findi n ma Isirayila ɲama xunyi ra.›»
